summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2179, for the improvement of Jackson Street from 6th Avenue South to 14th Avenue South, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by paving the same with vitrified brick laid upon a proper concrete foundation, with granite curbs, and by construction of necessary sewers and water mains, including hydrants, crosses, tees and other appurtenances and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 21738 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
